When Crime Spree enters, create a 1/1 red Human creature token. It gains haste until end of turn. [i](Choose one or more additional costs.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you didn’t disturb the peace since the beginning of your last turn, sacrifice Crime Spree. [i](Casting a spell on an opponent’s turn and one or more creatures dealing combat damage to an opponent disturb the peace.)[/i]
Creatures you control get +2/+0.
